title: 103_hr1947
content: Repeals the Internal Revenue Code's nonrefundable income tax credit for employment-related dependent care expenses, replacing it with a corresponding refundable 50 percent credit, reduced as the taxpayer's adjusted gross income exceeds $15,000 . Includes within the scope of the new credit up to $1,200 of respite care expenses incurred in the care of: (1) a dependent of the taxpayer who is at least 13 years old. Or (2) a spouse or other dependent who is physically or mentally incapable of self-care.
